login.lblError: An error occurred. Please check your data.
login.revPassword: At least 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number and '_'
home.litHeroText: Quick access to system administration and monitoring.
home.litBitText: Explore system events, auditing and tracking.
home.litRstText: Recover the system database from a backup file.
home.litBkpText: Create a .bak of the current database in one click.
home.litPermText: Grant extra page access beyond the base role.
blocked.litEmptyText: All clear. When users get blocked, they will show up here.
corrupt.banner.subtitleHasIssues: Inconsistencies were detected in DVH calculation. Review each table below.
corrupt.dvv.mismatch: The current DVH sum does not match the value stored in DVV.
corrupt.litDVVOkBody: The DVH sum across all tables matches the DVV table.
restore.title: Database Restore
restore.panelSub: Upload a valid .bak to restore the database.
restore.hint: Tip: Make a fresh backup before continuing.
restore.dropHint: Choose the file from your computer.
restore.valSize: The file exceeds the allowed size (max {0} MB).
restore.confirmText: I understand that data will be overwritten.
restore.msgRestoreDisabled: Restore is not enabled on this view yet.
restore.err.noLogicalNames: Logical file names could not be retrieved from the backup.
restore.err.params: Incomplete parameters to run the restore.
restore.err.singleUser: Could not set the database to single-user mode.
restore.msgAnalyzeFail: The backup could not be analyzed.
restore.err.noAnalysis: Validate the backup before running the restore.
backup.title: Database Backup
backup.panelSub: Create a .bak file with the database copy.
backup.hint: Tip: perform regular backups for greater security.
backup.destHint: Path where the .bak file will be saved
backup.confirmText: I confirm that I want to generate a new backup.
backup.msgFail: An error occurred while generating the backup.
backup.modalHint: Here you will list SERVER folders (e.g., C:\SqlBackups, D:\Backups\Artify). For now it is a manual selector; we'll populate it from the server later.
backup.modalFuture: (Future) A server folder tree will appear here to browse and select.
backup.valDestination: You must enter a destination folder.
maint.litSubtitle: We detected an inconsistency in database integrity. To protect your information, the system has been put into maintenance mode.
maint.lblItem2Value: Try again later or contact support
maint.litNote: If the problem persists after a few minutes, please reach out so we can assist you.
homecli.litEmpty: No auctions are available at the moment.
accden.litSubtitle: You do not have permission to view this page.
accden.litLead: This resource is restricted based on the role assigned to your account.
accden.litExtra: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact the administrator.
homecur.litHeroText: Quick access to curation tools and monitoring.
homecur.litObrText: Publish curated artworks with metadata and media.
homecur.litStaText: Performance of artworks and artists over time.
homecur.litListText: Browse the artists catalog with photos and details.
homecur.litViewObrText: Browse all submitted artworks; filter and review quick details.
homecur.litSubText: List an artwork for auction with base price + 1% commission.
homecur.litPendText: Review and start auctions that haven't begun.
art.litHeroText: Fill in the details to register a new artist.
art.rngFechaMax: The date cannot be in the future.
listart.litHeroText: See uploaded artists, their data, and manage deletions.
listart.emptyText: Once artists are added from “Add artists”, they will appear here.
listart.confirmEliminar: Are you sure you want to delete this artist? This action cannot be undone.
obra.title: Add Artwork
obra.hintTecnica: E.g., Oil on canvas, Acrylic, Mixed…
obra.hintPrecioBase: Must be greater than 0. Initial current price equals base.
obra.hintUrlImg: Must start with http(s):// and point to an image.
obra.hintOriginal: Check if it is a one-of-a-kind piece (not a reproduction/print).
verobras.search.placeholder: Search by title, technique, artist, or year...
permusr.litUsuarioHint: Choose the user to view and assign extra permissions beyond their role.
permusr.litNota: Checked pages are added to the permissions granted by the role. Role permissions cannot be removed here.
err.subasta.obra.requerida: You must select a valid artwork.
err.subasta.precioinicial.min: Initial price must be greater than zero.
err.subasta.incremento.min: Minimum increment must be greater than zero.
err.subasta.duracion.min: Duration must be greater than zero minutes.
err.subasta.programada.pasado: Scheduled start date cannot be in the past.
err.subasta.crear.ex: An error occurred while creating the auction.
err.subasta.noexiste: Auction with ID {0} was not found.
err.subasta.empezar.estado: Cannot start auction while in state {0}.
err.subasta.finalizar.estado: Only auctions in progress can be finished (current state: {0}).
err.subasta.finalizar.update: Failed to mark auction as finished.
err.subasta.cancelar.estado: Only pending or ongoing auctions can be canceled (current state: {0}).
err.oferta.subasta.requerida: The auction for this bid must be specified.
err.oferta.cliente.requerido: The client who placed the bid must be specified.
err.oferta.monto.min: Bid amount must be greater than zero.
err.oferta.subasta.noexiste: The specified auction (ID {0}) does not exist.
err.oferta.subasta.noencurso: The auction is not currently active (current state: {0}).
err.oferta.monto.insuficiente: The bid amount is lower than the required minimum ({0}).
err.oferta.crear.reglasql: The bid does not comply with auction rules or the auction has already ended.
err.oferta.id.requerido: A valid bid ID must be provided.
err.oferta.noexiste: Bid with ID {0} was not found.
err.oferta.mejor.vacia: No bids have been placed for this auction (ID {0}).
err.oferta.mejor.ex: Error while retrieving the highest bid.
err.suscripcion.inactiva: You don't have an active subscription.
err.suscripcion.noexiste: The user has no registered subscriptions.
err.suscripcion.obtener: The subscription could not be retrieved.
err.suscripcion.crear: An error occurred while creating the subscription.
err.suscripcion.solapada: There is already an active subscription during that period.
err.suscripcion.validar: The subscription status could not be verified.
subasta.crear.title: Create Auction
subasta.revPI: Valid numeric format (up to two decimals).
subasta.revInc: Valid numeric format (up to two decimals).
subpend.title: My pending auctions
sus.title: Activate subscription
sus.desc: Choose the plan to bid in auctions.
sus.detail.extend: Currently active until {0}. It will be extended until {1}.
sus.info.renewHint: Your subscription is active; confirming will extend it from the current expiration.
